title: Slow cooker corn chowder
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons salted butter', '110g streaky bacon, chopped', '1 medium onion, finely chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', '3 large potatoes, peeled and diced', '600ml vegetable stock', '2 (200g) tins sweetcorn, drained', '25g cornflour', '2 tablespoons cold water', '300ml full fat milk', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', 'salt and pepper, to taste']
